summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2828, for the improvement of the alley in block 8, Maynard's Plat, being the alley between 1st Avenue South and Occidental Avenue, and extending from Yesler Way to Washington Street, all in the City of Seattle, by paving the same with suitable material laid upon a proper concrete foundation; under Ordinance No. 33960 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
